desc: NEOM CLOTHING UK Is a unique start-up which sells 24 karrat Gold embroidery on formal and casual menswear. NEOM clothing introduces for the first time in fashion industry Pure 24 Karrat GOLD wire hand embroidered on formal and casual menswear.

layout.text: 24 karrat Gold wire is hand-stitched with different unique techinques and blended with hand thread work to form the elegant and luxurious NEOM logo and LOST LINES DESIGN.
